properties.description: Creation of the Relevant Representation Curated layer for use by ODT

source:
##### **NOTE**: The curated layer needs to be joined with Service User but since that's not available right now, we're ignoring the two columns. This NEEDS to be fixed once the Service User curated layer is available

Columns from Service User are representedId, and representativeId

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_curated_db.vw_nsip_representation
AS
SELECT DISTINCT,
    RR.representationId
    ,RR.referenceId
    ,RR.examinationLibraryRef
    ,COALESCE(RR.caseRef, '') AS caseRef
    ,RR.caseId
    ,CASE
        WHEN RR.status = 'New' OR RR.status = 'In Progress' THEN
            'awaiting_review'
        WHEN RR.status = 'Complete' THEN
            'valid'
        WHEN RR.status = 'Do Not Publish' THEN
            'invalid'
        ELSE 
            LOWER(RR.status)
    END AS status
    ,COALESCE(RR.originalRepresentation, '') AS originalRepresentation
    ,RR.redacted
    ,RR.redactedRepresentation
    ,RR.redactedBy
    ,RR.redactedNotes
    ,CASE
        WHEN su2.serviceUserType = 'Agent' THEN
            'AGENT'
        WHEN RR.representationFrom = 'An Organisation' THEN 
            'ORGANISATION'
        WHEN RR.representationFrom = 'Members of the Public/Businesses' and SU2.Organisation IS NOT NULL THEN
            'ORGANISATION'
        WHEN RR.representationFrom = 'Members of the Public/Businesses' THEN
            'PERSON'
        WHEN RR.representationFrom = 'Another Individual or Organisation' and SU2.Organisation IS NOT NULL THEN
             'ORGANISATION'
        WHEN RR.representationFrom = 'Another Individual or Organisation' THEN
            'PERSON'
        WHEN RR.representationFrom = 'Myself' THEN
            'PERSON'
        ELSE
            RR.RelRepOnBehalfOf
    END AS representationFrom
    ,COALESCE(SU.Id, '')AS representedId
    ,COALESCE(SU2.Id, '') AS representativeId
    ,CASE
        WHEN RR.representationFrom = 'An Organisation' THEN
            'ORGANISATION'
        WHEN RR.representationFrom = 'Members of the Public/Businesses' and SU.Organisation IS NOT NULL THEN
            'ORGANISATION'
        WHEN RR.representationFrom = 'Members of the Public/Businesses'THEN
            'PERSON'
        WHEN RR.representationFrom = 'Another Individual or Organisation' and SU.Organisation IS NOT NULL THEN 
            'ORGANISATION'
        WHEN RR.representationFrom = 'Another Individual or Organisation' THEN
            'PERSON'
        WHEN RR.representationFrom = 'Myself' THEN
            'PERSON'
        ELSE
            RR.registerFor
    END AS registerFor
    ,CASE
        WHEN RR.representationType = 'Other Statutory Consultees' THEN
            'Statutory Consultees'
        ELSE
            RR.representationType
        END AS representationType
        ,RR.dateReceived
        ,RR.attachmentIds
FROM 
        odw_harmonised_db.curated_service_user AS SU2
        INNER JOIN odw_harmonised_db.nsip_relevant_representation AS RR
            ON (SU2.sourceSUID = RR.agentcontactid OR SU2.sourceSUID = RR.representativeId)
            AND SU2.serviceUserType IN ('RepresentationContact', 'Agent')
            AND RR.ISActive = 'Y'
        LEFT OUTER JOIN odw_harmonised_db.curated_service_user AS SU
            ON SU.sourceSUID = RR.representedId
            AND SU.serviceUserType IN ('Applicant')

from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
spark = SparkSession.builder.getOrCreate()
view_df = spark.sql('SELECT * FROM odw_curated_db.vw_nsip_representation')
view_df.write.mode(overwrite).saveAsTable('odw_curated_db.nsip_representation')
